item.title: CVE-2022-4693|2024-08-03T01:48:39.545Z -- unknown -- user%20verification
item.description: The User Verification WordPress plugin before 1.0.94 was affected by an Auth Bypass security vulnerability. To bypass authentication, we only need to know the userâ€™s username. Depending on whose username we know, which can be easily queried because it is usually public data, we may even be given an administrative role on the website.
